title: Diamond Smurf Wise Words
body: Guy claims to be diamond smurf. makes me kek

replies.body: A support is one of the roles that can carry but they need to get into the right positioning or pull off the most insane moves. So someone saying this doesn't surprise me. This Summoner just needs to have a good partner that can respond to moves in less then a second which isn't actually that long in League of Legends.
I was on my lvl 5 smurf, pressed random, got swain and went sup. All the adc did was click on the enemy as soon as they appeared; got fed. idk if we won bc I left to do more important stuff

most high elo players play only 1 or 2 roles. that means they have little to no experience in other roles. 
not defending him, just saying

> [{quoted}](name=Bribery,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=6pxUtwIY,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-11-20T23:05:37.255+0000)
>
> most high elo players play only 1 or 2 roles. that means they have little to no experience in other roles. 
> not defending him, just saying

It doesn't matter how good you are at support, you won't win if your team is useless.
every role is hard to carry if ur teams useless

> [{quoted}](name=Bribery,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=6pxUtwIY,comment-id=000200000000,timestamp=2015-11-21T01:41:30.650+0000)
>
> every role is hard to carry if ur teams useless

It's virtually impossible to carry from support without a team. It's very possible to carry from another position.
o and also smurfs dont usually tell people to play safe cuz they generally dont care if they win lel
If his in support and not playing a cheesy kill lane support, then this is just completely accurate, there is only so much one person can do when the game atm is snowballed so easily.
